item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Red Stripe on Angell St. in Wayland Sq. across from Starbucks

I was recently here on an early Sunday for a late afternoon appetizer-dinner, and remembered how great it was the last time we were here - all the way back in Nov. '08! Red Stripe is billed as an American Brasserie (owned by the same people who own Mills Tavern - there is also a Red Stripe in Narragansett. Located in the Wayland Square area on the East Side, its a great place to pop into for a late lunch or early dinner or anytime for that matter, and has a large marble bar with fixed twirling bar stools in an appropriately French-American bistro atmosphere. Its been awhile - so let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a black and gray scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Red Stripe!
